item.title: 早间交易中国经济陷入困境，美债收盘，中国疑虑重重
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 为什么巴西种了那么多大豆却吃得那么少？
item.description: 巴西的美食中心圣保罗可能以其珍贵的烤肉和奢华的寿司而闻名，但一些高档餐厅正在使用一种新颖的明星配料：大豆。【原文：Brazil's foodie hub Sao Paulo may be best known for its prized cuts of grilled meat and lavish sushi spreads, but some upscale restaurants are featuring a novel star ingredient: soy.】

item.title: 本周财报和经济数据密集，期货涨跌互现
item.description: 周一，美国股指期货涨跌不一，投资者期待着本周的第三季度财报和重要数据，以寻求对世界最大经济体健康状况的了解。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were mixed on Monday as investors looked ahead to a week packed with third-quarter earnings reports and crucial data, seeking insights into the health of the world's largest economy.】

item.title: 阿西莫格鲁、约翰逊和罗宾逊荣获 2024 年诺贝尔经济学奖
item.description: 瑞典皇家科学院周一表示，达龙-阿斯莫格鲁、西蒙-约翰逊和詹姆斯-罗宾逊因 "对制度如何形成并影响繁荣的研究 "而荣获 2024 年诺贝尔经济学奖。【原文：Daron Acemoglu, Simon Johnson and James Robinson won the 2024 Nobel economics prize "for studies of how institutions are formed and affect prosperity", the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局对超过 3.5 万辆福特汽车的后摄像头故障展开调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周一表示，已开始对美国约 35,950 辆福特 Flex 汽车的后摄像头故障隐患进行初步评估。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said on Monday that it has opened a preliminary evaluation into about 35,950 Ford Flex vehicles in the United States over a potential rear-camera failure.】

item.title: 苏德意志报》称，运动人士希望禁止瑞银进入美国养老金市场
item.description: 据《南德意志报》（Sueddeutsche Zeitung）周一报道，一个运动团体希望瑞银失去美国法规的豁免权，因为该豁免权允许瑞士银行在违反银行业规定的情况下在美国养老金市场开展业务。【原文：A group of campaigners wants UBS to lose its exemption from U.S. regulations that allows the Swiss bank to operate in the American pension market despite breaking banking rules, Sueddeutsche Zeitung reported on Monday.】

item.title: 哈里斯针对黑人男性提出新的经济建议
item.description: 民主党总统候选人卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）周一公布了针对黑人男性的新政策提案，其中包括可免除的小型企业贷款和进入新的合法娱乐大麻行业。【原文：Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris unveiled new policy proposals aimed at Black men on Monday that include forgivable small business loans and access to a new legal recreational marijuana industry.】

item.title: 中国出口不及预期，唯一亮点逐渐消失
item.description: 中国 9 月份出口增长大幅放缓，进口也意外减速，大幅低于预期，表明制造商正在降价促销，以便在几个贸易伙伴加征关税之前转移库存。【原文：China's export growth slowed sharply in September while imports also unexpectedly decelerated, undershooting forecasts by big margins and suggesting manufacturers are slashing prices to move inventory ahead of tariffs from several trade partners.】

item.title: 对欧洲经济而言，美国大选风险大于上升空间
item.description: 对于欧洲经济而言，11 月 5 日的美国大选提供了一个 "最不坏 "的结果，即卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）出任总统，或与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的第二次交锋，后者有可能比第一次更加伤痕累累。【原文：For Europe's economy, the Nov. 5 U.S. election offers a "least bad" outcome of a challenging Kamala Harris presidency or a second encounter with Donald Trump which threatens to be yet more bruising than the first.】

item.title: 2024 年诺贝尔奖直播：经济科学奖即将揭晓
item.description: 经济学奖将是今年颁发的最后一个诺贝尔奖。【原文：The economics prize will be the last Nobel to be awarded this year.】

item.title: 图片显示中国商飞 ARJ21 支线飞机喷涂 C909 商标
item.description: 据航空爱好者论坛和中国社交媒体上发布的照片显示，中国商飞公司为其一架 ARJ21 支线喷气机喷涂了 C909 品牌，与该公司其他机型的命名惯例保持一致。【原文：Chinese planemaker COMAC has painted one of its ARJ21 regional jets with C909 branding, aligning with the manufacturer's naming conventions for its other models, according to photos posted on aviation enthusiast forums and Chinese social media.】

item.title: 中国刺激经济的承诺给房地产业带来的是希望而非信心
item.description: 中国金融业专业人士张晶（音译）从最近的股市上涨中赚到了足够多的钱，可以考虑跳上住房阶梯，但她希望在购房前能听到政府更多的意见。【原文：Chinese finance industry professional Zhang Jing made enough money from a recent stock market rally to consider hopping on the housing ladder but wants to hear more from the government before making a purchase.】

item.title: 黄油价格飙升，面包师为代价高昂的圣诞节做好准备
item.description: 近几个月来，黄油价格一路飙升，在欧洲各地的交易价格屡创新高，这对面包师和糕点师来说是个坏消息，因为他们正在准备圣诞庆祝活动，而且已经面临巧克力和糖的高成本。【原文：Butter prices have rocketed in recent months, trading at record highs across Europe in bad news for bakers and pastry makers as they prepare for Christmas celebrations and already face high chocolate and sugar costs.】

item.title: LVMH 投资者对中国市场对欧洲名牌产品需求疲软感到不安
item.description: 法国奢侈品集团路威酩轩集团（LVMH）的投资者迫切希望有迹象表明，中国新的财政刺激措施最终能让中国的富裕阶层和中产阶级购物者走出低谷，从而激励他们在中国一年一度最大规模的购物狂欢--"光棍节 "来临之前，出手购买价值4300美元的名牌皮包。【原文：Investors in French luxury group LVMH are eager for signs that China's new fiscal stimulus measures can finally pull wealthy and middle-class Chinese shoppers out of their funk, inspiring them to splash out on $4,300 designer leather handbags ahead of Singles Day, China's largest annual shopping spree.】

item.title: Stellantis 首席执行官塔瓦雷斯因美国危机在巴黎备受关注
item.description: 卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）周一在巴黎车展上的公开活动日程安排得满满当当，这预示着这位 Stellantis 公司的首席执行官在 9 月底发布巨额利润预警后，即使宣布了退休日期，仍将全力以赴。【原文：Carlos Tavares' packed schedule of public events at the Paris auto show on Monday signals the Stellantis CEO will come out fighting after a massive profit warning in late September, even after announcing his retirement date.】

item.title: 中国铜和铁矿石仍是刺激政策的支持者，但其他国家对此持怀疑态度：罗素
item.description: 西方投资者和中国投资者对中国政府最新的刺激政策声明有着不同的反应，而这两类投资者很可能都在某种程度上忽略了重点。【原文：Western and Chinese investors had different reactions to the latest stimulus pronouncements by Beijing, and it's likely that both groups are somewhat missing the point.】

item.title: 全力以赴？欧洲央行的五个问题
item.description: 欧洲中央银行似乎将在周四再次降息，而就在几周前，欧洲中央银行还没有降息的意愿。【原文：The European Central Bank looks set to deliver another interest rate cut on Thursday it had little appetite to point to just weeks ago.】

item.title: 欧洲 中国刺激政策褒贬不一
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 航天大国齐聚米兰，登月竞赛和私人竞争成为焦点
item.description: 本周，世界各航天机构将在米兰举行会议，地缘政治竞争将推动地球轨道和月球上新一轮的全球竞赛，而私营部门也将大力参与，努力跟上埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）主导的 SpaceX 公司的步伐。【原文：The world's space agencies are meeting in Milan this week as geopolitical rivalry fuels a new global race in Earth's orbit and on the moon, with heavy involvement from a private sector toiling to keep pace with Elon Musk's dominant SpaceX.】

item.title: 聚焦：低成本混合动力技术让雷诺在艰难的电动车转型中获得喘息空间
item.description: 雷诺首席执行官卢卡-德-梅奥（Luca de Meo）对低成本变速箱技术的押注，使这家法国汽车制造商在欧洲快速增长的混合动力汽车市场中占据了一席之地，在竞争对手受到电动汽车挑战的挤压时，为自己赢得了喘息的空间。【原文：Renault CEO Luca de Meo's bet on a low-cost gearbox technology is allowing the French carmaker to gain ground in Europe's fast-growing hybrid car market, giving it some breathing space as rivals get squeezed by the electric mobility challenge.】

item.title: 中国试图左右全球金属定价的内幕
item.description: 中国正在采取措施，对其生产和消费的大量工业金属进行定价，吸引外国公司在上海期货交易所进行交易，这最终将使全球市场支离破碎。【原文：China is locking in steps to shape the pricing of the vast quantities of industrial metals it produces and consumes, with moves to attract foreign firms to trade on Shanghai's futures exchange, which would eventually fragment global markets.】

item.title: 维珍澳大利亚公布年度利润，集团收入增长 6.8
item.description: 维珍澳大利亚航空公司（Virgin Australia）周一表示，自去年 11 年来首次恢复盈利以来，该公司已连续第二年实现税后盈利，集团收入同比增长 6.8%。【原文：Airline Virgin Australia said on Monday it had recorded its second year of after-tax profitability since returning to profit last year for the first time in 11 years, and a 6.8% year-on-year increase in group revenue.】

item.title: 亚洲股市等待中国市场对刺激承诺细节的回应
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市在假期清淡的早盘交易中几乎没有波动，投资者担心中国大陆市场会对上周末政府的经济刺激承诺作出何种反应。【原文：Asian stocks hardly budged in early holiday-thinned trade on Monday, with investors nervous as to how markets in mainland China would react to government economic stimulus promises over the weekend which, though broad, were light on detail.】

item.title: 投资者解读中国刺激计划，美元扩大涨幅
item.description: 美元在周一亚洲早盘交易中扩大了涨幅，原因是日本假期消耗了流动性，而中国周末令人失望的刺激措施公告则成为市场关注的焦点。【原文：The dollar extended its gains in early Monday trades in Asia as a holiday in Japan sapped liquidity, leaving China's somewhat disappointing weekend stimulus announcements the focus of market attention.】

item.title: 初步数据显示，新加坡第三季度国内生产总值同比增长 4.1
item.description: 新加坡政府周一公布的初步数据显示，新加坡第三季度经济同比增长4.1%。【原文：Singapore's economy grew 4.1% in the third quarter from a year earlier, preliminary government data showed on Monday.】

item.title: 高盛将 2024 年中国国内生产总值（GDP）预期上调至 4.9
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）在一份研究报告中将中国 2024 年的国内生产总值预期从 4.7% 上调至 4.9%，理由是中国政府采取了最新一轮的经济刺激措施。【原文：Goldman Sachs raised China's gross domestic product forecast to 4.9% from 4.7% for 2024, according to a research note, citing the government's latest round of stimulus measures.】

item.title: 新加坡央行维持货币政策不变，第三季度经济增长回升
item.description: 新加坡央行周一一如预期维持货币政策设置不变，因为数据显示第三季度经济增速加快。【原文：Singapore's central bank on Monday left its monetary policy settings unchanged, as expected, as data showed the economy picked up pace in the third quarter.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片需求强劲，台积电第三季度利润大增 40
item.description: 台湾中芯国际集成电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co , the main producer of advanced chips used in artificial intelligence applications, is expected to report a 40% leap in third-quarter profit on Thursday thanks to soaring demand.】

item.title: 受中国经济数据影响，油价下跌超过 1 美元
item.description: 由于周末令人失望的中国通胀数据引发了对需求的担忧，周一亚洲早盘油价下跌了一美元。【原文：Oil prices fell by a dollar in early Asian trading on Monday after disappointing Chinese inflation data over the weekend stoked fears about demand.】
